Arnab Goswani,

Learn to be patient and listen to the other side. You look pretty dumb when 
you do not have patience and try interrupting. I wonder if you have been 
paid to create drift among the different ethnic groups in India. I do not 
belong to any political party  but I do understand that Kumar Vishwas is 
Hindi poet of high caliber and he makes you enjoy his "Kavi Sammelans". 
That is all he cares about.

Note that I am a South Indian and have extremely good command over Hindi 
language. I have never ever felt offended with Kumar's comments. You are 
simply trying to politicize and making a hill out of a mole. Shame on you.

Until now I had a reasonably good impression about you. Alas! you just shot 
at your own leg. Now, I seriously recommend you learn Hindi so that you can 
also equally enjoy his poetic talents and don't look like an IDIOT in front 
of public.

Good luck to your journalism, media manners and God bless India.
